isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 27-SI SERIES, TYPE 200 - REPAIR PROCEDURES - ROTOR FIELD WINDING CHECKS

svcproc.title: ROTOR FIELD WINDING CHECKS
svcproc.para: The winding is checked for short circuits or excessive resistance.
To check for opens, connect the ohmmeter to each slip ring. If the ohmmeter reading is high (infinite), the winding is open ( Figure 11).

To check the resistance connect an ohmmeter using a lower scale (R X 1 or R X 10) to the two slip rings ( Figure 11). If the resistance reading is below the specified value, the winding is shorted; if above the specified value the winding has excessive resistance. The specified resistance value can be determined by dividing the voltage by the current given in SPECIFICATIONS
.
To check for grounds, connect ohmmeter as shown in Figure 11. Replace rotor if reading is less than infinite. Use low scale on ohmmeter (R x 1 or R x 10).
